name: Kahakuhale Serevi
story: Hanini Lomu has always been a fighter. Growing up in the streets of Martinique, he even joined a gang for a brief period before he realized he wanted to do better. He joined the French Foreign Legion, where he served for 20 years before retiring and joining the Independent faction in Arma 3. Hanini is a disciplined soldier who takes pride in his work, but he is also quiet and introspective, often spending his free time reading or listening to music.
